subject.normal: Google maps update, notifies the model!

headers.subject: Google maps update, notifies the model!
headers.received: by gwj15 with SMTP id 15sf898352gwj.15 for <google.larry.sergey@a.markmail.org>; Thu, 03 Feb 2011 10:23:51 -0800 (PST)

body.para: I was surprised last night when I saw a cute map thumbnail in front of the title of the Sounio model in Attica, Greece. I had noticed already that the map in atticca has been updated and i had in mind to update the model soon. But after the notification, i worked all night and replaced the filel. I had to reposition again, correct some old silly mistakes and the model looks great! The new terrain pass very much to the ancient ruins and gives another atmosphere! http://sketchup.google.com/3dwarehouse/details?mid=a020874608cad09bfe0d75618d817a51 Thanks to the 3dwarehouse Team for the new notification! It shows they respect the modelers. A couple of weeks i had read in this forum from SnowTiger, who was complaining for that and proposing excactly the same thing! Thank you too, SnowTiger! Keep on great!
ps: email notification would be even better because i think that the most modelers don't visit their models everyday
body.footer:
-- You received this message because you are subscribed to the "3D Modeling for
Google Earth & Maps" group.
body.para:
